column4: can someone please help me setting up MultiGet download manager with Flashgot? it dos accept command line arguments
!MultiGet
please can someone help me here i have a big problem!
though i'm hesitant to say that having trouble setting up a download manager for your pr0n is a big problem
i have a really bad internet connection and i used to keep up with it by using DAP on windows, i used it with flashgot, now using MultiGet for loinux i can't integrate it with flashgot!
it's a very critical problem because my connection is only 7KBites per second down you see
you have more options than you think. what keeps your connection up?
it does accept command line arguments btw but i don't know how to enter them in
a handy Download manager with a good interface maybe?
to be honest, a flashgot forum would be far better than an ubuntu IRC channel
but what specifically about your download manager keeps your connection up?
google is your friend
i couldn't find anything in the forums but i did find this though about adding command arguments for MultiGet: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/7671/
can you help me add these arguments to flashgot?
no, i don't use either software
do you think anyone here can help?
did you even try http://flashgot.net/
duh of course i did
i know the way, i just can't get it right
so toy with it more, or ask in their forums
i'll try my best. Thnks c u
